item.title: 高盛称市场对澳大利亚央行降息的定价 "太浅
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc）认为，货币市场对澳大利亚未来 12 个月降息的定价 "过于肤浅"，并预测通胀降温和失业率上升将迫使储备银行提前采取行动。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. reckons money market pricing for Australian interest-rate cuts over the next 12 months is “too shallow,” forecasting instead that cooling inflation and rising unemployment will force the Reserve Bank to act earlier.】

item.title: 开发商万科将获得 11 亿美元单位担保贷款
item.description: 中国万科企业股份有限公司（China Vanke Co., Ltd.）表示，该公司将获得由其下属单位担保的 78 亿元（11 亿美元）银行贷款，以 "满足业务运营需求"，这家现金紧张的开发商正努力避免违约。【原文：China Vanke Co. said it will receive 7.8 billion yuan ($1.1 billion) of bank loans guaranteed by its units, an effort to “meet business operations needs,” as the cash-strained developer seeks to avoid a default.】

item.title: Segantii 在关闭前赎回申请达到 10 亿美元
item.description: Segantii Capital Management Ltd. 的对冲基金在决定关闭之前面临着近 10 亿美元的撤资请求，熟悉此事的人士称，这凸显了本月香港内幕交易指控对投资者信心的影响。【原文：Segantii Capital Management Ltd.’s hedge fund faced nearly $1 billion of withdrawal requests before its decision to shut down, people familiar with the matter said, highlighting the impact on investor confidence from this month’s insider trading charge in Hong Kong.】

item.title: 禽流感蔓延到澳大利亚维多利亚州的第二个农场
item.description: 据报道，澳大利亚东南部地区已扑杀了数十万只蛋鸡，因为当地采取了检疫措施来控制高致病性禽流感的爆发。【原文：Hundreds of thousands of egg-laying chickens are reported to have been culled in Australia’s southeast as quarantine measures are put in place to contain outbreaks of highly pathogenic avian influenza.】

item.title: 米莱警告内阁的未来取决于阿根廷国会的投票结果
item.description: 阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱伊周四警告说，他的整个内阁将接受审查，这取决于他的亲商改革法案在国会的审议结果。【原文：Argentine President Javier Milei warned Thursday that his entire cabinet will be under review depending on the result of his pro-business reform bill grinding its way through Congress.】

item.title: 丝绸称新西兰央行 "绝对 "准备在必要时加息
item.description: 新西兰央行行长助理卡伦-希尔克（Karen Silk）表示，如果经济发展意味着当前的政策设置限制性不足以使通胀率回到目标水平，那么新西兰央行准备提高利率。【原文：New Zealand’s central bank is prepared to raise interest rates if economic developments mean current policy settings aren’t restrictive enough to bring inflation back to target, Assistant Governor Karen Silk said.】

item.title: 生命线引发对中国万科扭亏为盈的疯狂押注
item.description: 由于中国的住房救助计划和该房地产公司本月获得的近 40 亿美元资金刺激了对其生存的押注，中国万科股份有限公司的股票交易飙升至四年来的最高水平。【原文：Trading in shares of China Vanke Co. has surged to the highest level in four years as China’s housing rescue package and nearly $4 billion of funding secured by the property firm this month spur bets on its survival.】

item.title: 利润回升后野村高管薪酬增长 150
item.description: 野村控股公司（Nomura Holdings Inc.【原文：Nomura Holdings Inc. more than doubled pay for its top managers last fiscal year, as earnings at Japan’s largest brokerage rebounded on better trading and the nation’s economic recovery.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 570 亿澳元养老金进军私募股权投资领域
item.description: 澳大利亚最大的养老基金之一，规模达 850 亿澳元（566 亿美元）的 Rest 基金，计划在未来两年内加大对私募股权投资的投入，目标是到 2026 年实现 5% 的分配目标。【原文：One of Australia’s largest pension funds, the A$85 billion ($56.6 billion) Rest, plans to splash more on private equity investments in the next two years as it targets a 5% allocation target by 2026.】

item.title: 市场出现疲软迹象，石油维持在三个月低点附近
item.description: 石油交易接近三个多月来的最低水平，因为在美国夏季驾车季节到来之前，市场出现疲软迹象。【原文：Oil traded near lowest level in over three months as the market flashed signs of weakness ahead of the US summer driving season.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好。受利率前景影响，股票和债券下跌。大型科技公司期待好莱坞来训练人工智能软件。亚洲房地产飙升。以下是您需要了解的信息。【原文：Good morning. Stocks and bonds drop on rate outlook. Big tech companies look to Hollywood to train AI software. Asian property soars. Here's what you need to know. — Sebastian Boyd】

item.title: 中国 5,380 亿美元存款外流推动债券反弹
item.description: 中国通过减少银行存款的诱惑力来促进经济增长的努力，推动了创纪录的现金外流，其中很大一部分流入了债券和理财产品。【原文：China’s efforts to bolster economic growth by reducing the allure of bank deposits has driven a record exodus from cash, with a big proportion of that going into bonds and wealth management products.】

item.title: 波音和新加坡航空事故后，乘客对安全问题感到恐慌
item.description: 今年发生的一系列备受瞩目的航空事故给公众留下了深刻的印象。【原文：A spate of high-profile airline accidents this year have left a lasting impression on the public.】

item.title: 美联储缩表推迟，亚洲股市将下滑：市场综述
item.description: 美国联邦储备委员会（Federal Reserve）公布的经济活动数据显示，美联储可能在今年大部分时间内按兵不动，亚洲股市有望追随华尔街走低。【原文：Asian stocks are poised to track Wall Street lower following activity data that signaled the Federal Reserve may keep rates on hold for most of this year.】

item.title: 利率预测上调后，加拿大将增加债务支出
item.description: 加拿大政府表示，今年将在债务成本上花费更多，因为它更新了预测，以反映高于预期的利率前景。【原文：Canada’s government says it will spend more on debt costs this year as it updates its forecasts to reflect a higher-than-expected outlook for interest rates.】

item.title: 交叉持股缩减，日本企业向个人求助
item.description: 日本公司正试图建立个人投资者的忠诚度，以抵消机构的抛售潮。【原文：Japanese firms are trying to build loyalty with individual investors to offset a wave of selling by institutions.】

item.title: 花旗、汇丰命令更多员工每周五天在办公室工作
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc）和汇丰控股公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）正在命令更多的美国员工每周五天到公司办公室报到，因为监管的变化使得华尔街允许在家办公变得更加棘手。【原文：Citigroup Inc. and HSBC Holdings Plc are ordering more US staffers to report to company offices five days a week as regulatory changes make it trickier for Wall Street to allow working from home.】

item.title: 盎格鲁集团大股东支持矿商对必和必拓谈判的立场
item.description: 英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）的几位大股东表示，他们支持该公司在接受任何收购提议之前，努力说服必和必拓集团改变其收购提议的结构，或对其带来的风险进行补偿。【原文：Several of Anglo American Plc’s big shareholders say they support the company’s efforts to persuade BHP Group to change the structure of its takeover proposal or compensate for the risks it presents, before accepting any offer.】

item.title: 西班牙雷普索尔公司获得在委内瑞拉运营的美国许可证
item.description: 据知情人士透露，西班牙钻井商雷普索尔公司（Repsol SA）周三从美国获得了在 5 月 31 日之后继续在委内瑞拉运营的许可。【原文：Spanish driller Repsol SA obtained a license from the US on Wednesday to keep operating in Venezuela after May 31, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.description: 2021 年 3 月，随着 Archegos 资本管理公司（Archegos Capital Management）陷入困境，该公司开始试图从整个华尔街的交易账户中提取多余的现金。当时，它在高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：As Archegos Capital Management cratered in March 2021, it began trying to pull excess cash from trading accounts across Wall Street. At the time, it had about $470 million with Goldman Sachs Group Inc.】

item.title: 马斯克拒绝透露是否仍致力于生产更便宜的特斯拉电动汽车
item.description: 特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc.首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）不想谈论他是否致力于向市场推出低成本电动汽车，也不想谈论这家汽车制造商过去几个月的艰难处境。【原文：Tesla Inc. Chief Executive Officer Elon Musk doesn’t want to talk about whether he’s committed to bringing a low-cost electric vehicle to market, or the carmaker’s rough last few months.】

item.title: 全球经济双速增长，通胀消退不均，七国集团焦虑不安
item.description: 在本周举行的七国集团会议上，官员们正面临着货币政策同步性降低的前景，美国的强势导致全球经济双速发展，为会议蒙上了一层阴影。【原文：A two-speed global economy skewed by US strength is overshadowing this week’s Group of Seven meeting as officials confront the prospect of less synchronized monetary policies.】

item.title: 特斯拉在裁员数周后发布人工智能和自动驾驶汽车的招聘信息
item.description: 特斯拉公司发布了十几个自动驾驶和人工智能职位，这是该公司在连续数周裁员后首次出现员工增长迹象。【原文：Tesla Inc. has posted more than a dozen Autopilot and artificial intelligence positions, its first sign of workforce growth after weeks of rolling layoffs.】

item.title: 简街避免在纠纷中向千禧年披露机密
item.description: 简街集团暂时不必与被其起诉的前交易员分享商业机密，因为这些交易员在离开简街集团后转投了竞争对手的公司。【原文：Jane Street Group was spared for now from having to share trade secrets with former traders it sued after they left for a rival firm.】

item.title: 千禧一代领导人人气下降阻碍厄瓜多尔债券反弹 80
item.description: 丹尼尔-诺沃亚（Daniel Noboa）作为厄瓜多尔新上任的千禧一代领导人，发誓要彻底改变国家陷入困境的经济，解决犯罪率上升的问题，因此赢得了投资者的青睐。【原文：Daniel Noboa won over investors when he came to office as the fresh-faced, millennial leader of Ecuador, vowing to overhaul the nation’s troubled economy and tackle rising crime.】

item.title: 墨西哥银行称服务价格坚挺要求谨慎调整利率
item.description: 墨西哥央行行长们认为，服务业价格通胀持续和就业市场强劲是谨慎降息的理由。【原文：Mexican central bankers see sticky services price inflation and a strong jobs market as reasons to cut interest rates only cautiously.】

item.title: 美国抵押贷款利率自 4 月初以来首次降至 7% 以下
item.description: 美国的抵押贷款利率一个多月来首次跌破 7%。【原文：Mortgage rates in the US dipped below 7% for the first time in more than a month.】

item.title: 英国塞兹韦尔核电站在大选前继续筹款
item.description: 英国塞兹韦尔 C 核电厂的开发商正在推进该项目在今年完成融资，尽管迫在眉睫的大选有可能使时间表变得更加复杂。【原文：The developer of the UK’s Sizewell C nuclear power plant is pushing ahead to complete financing for the project this year even as a looming election risks complicating the timeline.】

item.title: 大众称削减成本而非关税将保护欧洲免受中国电动汽车的影响
item.description: 大众汽车公司（Volkswagen AG）表示，欧盟对中国生产的电动汽车征收更高的进口关税只会带来短暂的喘息机会，从长远来看，降低成本是保持竞争力的必要条件。【原文：Volkswagen AG said higher import tariffs for Chinese-made EVs in the European Union will offer only a short respite, with lower costs necessary to stay competitive over the long run.】
